parameters.name: BOleData
parameters.description: Byte array for the buffer data

title: ISwOLEObject.IGetBuffer
description: Gets the data for this OLE object.
signature:
void IGetBuffer( 
   System.Int32
OleBufferSize
,
   out System.byte
BOleData
)

parameters.name: BOleData
parameters.description: Byte array for the buffer data

remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ISwOLEObject::BufferSize
to get the value for OleBufferSize.
